page.title: 02POPULATION
page.content: The area has a population of about nine hundred.A census of the new estates revealed some interesting information.Fifty-five percent of the owners have moved into the area in the last four years.Only seven percent have lived here for more than thirteen years.It also showed that serventy five percent have moved to Witheridge from London and the south-east.The reasons for moving here are interesting.Thirty percent have retired to the area , twenty percent because they like the area , eighteen percent to find work and thirteen percent to be near relatives.When asked what they liked thirty five liked the freindliness in the village, twenty three percent liked the village itself and seventeen percent liked the peace and quiet.
